Great game. Amazing contrast in overall game play between playing survivor X Killer. Also switching between killers reveals entirely different ways to approach the hunt. Playing as a survivor when first learning to play the game is terrifying for sure. Once you start to not be so scared you can really learn to do more than just survive!

노잼

i love this game. from the unsuspecting spooks of a game with other random killers, to the downright hilarity of the custom games with friends, this game is perfect if you want unexpected giggles, followed by horrific scares.
that being said, there are obviously some setbacks, like the matchmaking.
Lets say, i am a rank 20, baby survivor, who just bought the game.
and the other random survivors are also between rank 17-20.
and we get paired with a rank 1-5 killer.
now thats obviously not fair, but most of the time, the community is either 50/50 forgiving for new player, or merciless towards new players.

Overall this game is extremely fun and even better with friends!
This game is very fun to play whenever, You can have fun with friends, You can level up ranks, Just a very good game to play all together. I recommend this game.

Comecei jogando esse game em 2017, parei algumas vezes e decidi voltar a jogar por meados de 2019. Desde então, se tornou o game mais divertido que eu já joguei nos últimos anos (multiplayer).

A comunidade de players desse jogo é de longe uma das mais tóxicas e desrespeitosas que eu já presenciei em jogos multiplayer. Cada partida é um teste de paciência. Entretanto, a proposta e a qualidade do jogo melhora a cada atualização, mostrando preocupação dos criadores para com o jogo em sí.

Great game to play with friends
GAME

- Anyone who says there's an issue with matchmaking is right and wrong. Matchmaking is fine, it can't really get any better; this is not a competitive game. You can rank up if you do well, regardless if your teammates are bad.
- The game has come a long way and will always still be improved WHILE ALSO making new dlc to make money. Bugs get fixed and they're usually funny anyway, but no the devs are not the greatest at fixing stuff. I've personally never had my experience ruined with a bug during an actual game. 
- The game is not grindy. if you want every perk it is, but perks aren't necessary. Progression feels pretty good.

TLDR: The game is good. It can be frustrating if you take it too seriously. Worth every dollar
Terrible devs, toxic community, terrible optimization, overpriced cosmetics, too much of a grind. Played it a lot on Xbone

The game may be scary the first two or three rounds, but afterwards it becomes not scary at all. The game is constantly undergoing updates, getting new content, and having events. With a recent major one being crossplay. The game is still going strong with a big community. The game is also covered on many platforms. It's simple enough to understand and learn, but also takes a while to get gud.

Its a good game but this is not the game to sink all of your time in to. The devs are far more concerned with forcing licensed killers into the game for the $ when most of said killers are really just not great fits for the game. Getting to red rank in survivor is more of a testament to the state of the game than it is a reflection of your skill. I highly recommend checking out new asymmetrical games that are on the horizon because even the most loyal DBD fans will admit this game has not been well taken care of and certainly not become what it could've been.
不错的游戏，很惊心动魄，耐玩
If you like competitive multiplayer, and horror games, this will be your new favorite.

真好

I honestly really like this game, it has a great play style and its a lot of fun to play with friends. But the reason i gave it a thumbs down is because of the fact that it doesn't offer in game chat with randoms. I was pretty surprised when i first found out there was no game chat, it just seems to me that a game like this would more than anything need game chat to communicate with your teammates. When i play with my friends on Xbox or Playstation i have to get them to join a discord call on their phones just so we can talk to each other while we play, which isn't a problem for me but obviously is inconvenient for them. if they were to add game chat i would rate this game a 9/10

Long standing easy to fix bugs go ignored. Zero server protections in place to stop cheaters. Releasing DLC in a broken state with the majority of the content of the DLC bugged just so they can push it out before Christmas to get sales. The core gameplay is fun but you start noticing a lot of little things that shouldn't be problems at all. If this were a FREE game where you bought DLC addons for it, fine. I'd recommend it to most people. But the fact that you are expected to buy the base game and then addons, especially if you want to be competitive as a killer main, is silly.

BHVR needs to get their shit together and focus on bug fix, performance improvements, stability, and server cheat protection.

Jogo muito bom!
Tem sempre uma nova atualização com coisas novas, principalmente bug's. Mas relaxa que não demora e eles soltam o hotfix... com outros novos bugs.
Entra na partida, cai aquele mapa que você ama jogar!
Você morre com 1 minuto de partida, porque o mapa é mal otimizado (20fps) e o killer te tunnela.
Você fica p.u.t.o e vai jogar de killer, agora não tem como piorar, nada mais te abala.
-Mata 3 jogando na moral
-A tua quarta stack do barbecue passou o jogo inteiro arrastando a bunda pelo canto do mapa
-Ele acha a hatch primeiro que você
-No pós chat manda ''gg izi macaco lisho brazuca''
Fecha o jogo e vai dormir.
